stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, you may pay 1 credit. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, you may pay 1[credit]. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Vasilisa
